title: A Peloton in the Produce Aisle: Stage 6 of 2024 Vuelta a España Will Start inside a Superstore
content:
French supermarket giant Carrefour celebrates Vuelta sponsorship anniversary with wacky PR stunt.

Read the full article at A Peloton in the Produce Aisle: Stage 6 of 2024 Vuelta a España Will Start inside a Superstore on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
